snippet: Contrary to perception, operation of game clocks at N.F.L. stadiums is handled by employees of the league, not hometown timekeepers.
abstract: Many coaches, players and fans have raised the issue of clock manipulation by hometown timekeepers, but there is little evidence to support the accusations; contrary to perception, operation of game clocks at NFL stadiums is handled by league rather than local employees.
lead_paragraph: Contrary to perception, operation of game clocks at N.F.L. stadiums is handled by employees of the league, not hometown timekeepers.

headline.seo: In the N.F.L.’s Game of Beat the Clock, Time Is on No One’s Side
headline.main: In a Game That Melts the Clock, Time Is on No One’s Side
headline.print_headline: In a Game That Melts the Clock, Time Is on No One’s Side
